[{"type": "service", "id": "a9529b0c-af24-446d-917f-6e8ca1d42dae", "value": {"category": "Persona", "icon": "fas fa-crosshairs", "cover": null, "description": "

How Takwimu benefits you

Takwimu offers value added services to researchers, academics and policy analysts who need access to quality data - particularly new, unpublished and hyper-local data - and expert analysis on the political systems behind human development outcomes; who makes the decisions, who is paying and who benefits?

", "title": "Researchers and Analysts"}}, {"type": "service", "id": "139b1e5b-e748-4dc3-918f-992551614db8", "value": {"category": "Persona", "icon": "fas fa-drafting-compass", "cover": null, "description": "

How Takwimu benefits you

Takwimu equips social enterprises and start-ups with market and political intelligence to better understand the demand and opportunity for new products and services, map customer segments and delivery mechanisms, and build their business case with quality data and insights.

", "title": "Social Entrepreneurs"}}, {"type": "service", "id": "2ee55dd2-0def-4276-86fe-dc8d3f484637", "value": {"category": "Persona", "icon": "fas fa-hand-spock", "cover": null, "description": "

How Takwimu benefits you

Takwimu empowers NGOs, media, infomediaries and civic engagement agencies to advocate more effectively by providing clear, simple and shareable data visualisations and storytelling tools that help to explain, evidence and build engagement around key development challenges.

", "title": "Media and Advocates"}}, {"type": "service", "id": "81adcc83-3bbb-475f-aeeb-31f970ab2c8e", "value": {"category": "Persona", "icon": "fas fa-building", "cover": null, "description": "

How Takwimu benefits you

Takwimu provides national governments, development finance institutions, Foundations and other grant-making bodies with comparative, data-driven analysis and insights into the political economy shaping policy, budgeting and programming in the key development sectors.

", "title": "Governments and Investors"}}, {"type": "service", "id": "93811ab7-0458-4307-a31e-2cdd7f092ad8", "value": {"category": "Standard", "icon": "", "cover": null, "description": "
